TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理客户端身份验证过程中调用的身份验证模块。

span.span: Manages the authentication modules called during the client authentication process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个静态类，管理应用程序使用的身份验证模块。 is a static class that manages the authentication modules that an application uses. 当请求受保护的资源，调用方法以获取要在后续请求中使用的实例。When a request is made to protected resources, the calls the method to get an instance to use in subsequent requests. 查询每个已注册身份验证模块，通过调用每个模块的方法。The queries each registered authentication module by calling the method for each module. 要返回的第一个身份验证模块实例用于对请求进行身份验证。The first authentication module to return an instance is used to authenticate the request. 模块，它们提供基本、 摘要式、 协商、 NTLM、 和 Kerberos 身份验证类型注册到默认情况下。Modules that provide the basic, digest, negotiate, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication types are registered with the by default. 实现的附加身份验证模块可以使用添加接口方法。Additional authentication modules that implement the interface can be added using the method. 添加到列表的顺序在称为身份验证模块。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. > [!NOTE] > Kerberos 和协商身份验证类型不支持在 Windows 95/98 或 Windows NT 4.0 上。The Kerberos and negotiate authentication type is not supported on Windows 95/98 or Windows NT 4.0. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Authorization Authenticate (string challenge, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.Authorization Authenticate(string challenge, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Shared Function Authenticate (challenge As String, request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ challenge, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);

span.span: The challenge returned by the Internet resource.
The that initiated the authentication challenge.

summary.span: 调用每个已注册的身份验证模块以查找第一个可响应身份验证请求的模块。

span.span: Calls each registered authentication module to find the first module that can respond to the authentication request.

returns.span: 类的实例，包含授权尝试的结果。

span.span: An instance of the class containing the result of the authorization attempt.

returns.span: 如果没有身份验证模块响应质询，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no authentication module to respond to the challenge, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法直到模块之一做出响应与每个已注册身份验证模块实例。The method calls the method on each registered authentication module until one of the module responds with an instance. 第一个返回实例用于进行身份验证请求。The first instance returned is used to authenticate the request. 如果没有身份验证模块可以验证该请求，方法返回`null`。If no authentication module can authenticate the request, the method returns `null`. 身份验证模块的调用与注册顺序。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they are registered with the .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.ICredentialPolicy CredentialPolicy { get; set; }
.property class System.Net.ICredentialPolicy CredentialPolicy
Public Shared Property CredentialPolicy As ICredentialPolicy
public: static property System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ CredentialPolicy { System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置凭据策略，该凭据策略将用于使用 类发出的资源请求。

span.span: Gets or sets the credential policy to be used for resource requests made using the class.

value.span: 一个实现 接口的对象，该接口确定凭据是否随请求一起发送。

span.span: An object that implements the interface that determines whether credentials are sent with requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 凭据策略确定是否发送对网络资源，如 Web 页的内容的请求时发送的凭据。The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a request for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page. 如果发送凭据，需要客户端身份验证服务器可以尝试时收到的请求而不是发送响应，该值指示需要客户端的凭据进行客户端身份验证。If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response indicating that the client's credentials are required. 虽然这省去了与服务器的往返行程，这必须与在网络上发送凭据中的固有安全风险进行权衡。While this saves a round trip to the server, this must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network. 目标服务器不需要客户端身份验证时，最好不发送凭据。When the destination server does not require client authentication it is best to not send credentials. 凭据策略将会仅为指定的凭据或使用的请求调用对象，它指定凭据。The credential policy will be called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置凭据策略。The following code example demonstrates setting the credential policy. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary CustomTargetNameDictionary { get; }
.property class System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary CustomTargetNameDictionary
Public Shared ReadOnly Property CustomTargetNameDictionary As StringDictionary
public: static property System::Collections::Specialized::StringDictionary ^ CustomTargetNameDictionary { System::Collections::Specialized::StringDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含服务主体名称 (SPN) 的字典，这些 SPN 用于在 Kerberos 身份验证期间为使用 及其派生类发出的请求标识主机。

span.span: Gets the dictionary that contains Service Principal Names (SPNs) that are used to identify hosts during Kerberos authentication for requests made using and its derived classes.

value.span: 一个可写的 ，它包含构成主机信息的键的 SPN 值。

span.span: A writable that contains the SPN values for keys composed of host information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SPN 是依据客户端唯一标识的服务或用于相互身份验证的服务器上的应用程序实例的名称。An SPN is a name by which a client uniquely identifies an instance of a service or application on a server for purposes of mutual authentication. 默认情况下，请求相互身份验证，你可以通过设置要求到在请求中。Mutual authentication is requested by default, and you can require it by setting to in your request. 当目标必须提供客户端需要相互身份验证，SPN。When a requires mutual authentication, the SPN for the destination must be supplied by the client. 如果你知道 SPN，你可以将其添加到之前发送请求。If you know the SPN, you can add it to the before sending the request. 如果未向此字典中，添加 SPN 信息使用方法构成最可能的 SPN; 但是，这是一个计算的值，可能不正确。If you have not added SPN information to this dictionary, the uses the method to compose the most likely SPN; however, this is a computed value and might be incorrect. 如果相互身份验证尝试并失败，你可以检查字典以确定计算得出的 SPN。If mutual authentication is attempted and fails, you can check the dictionary to determine the computed SPN. 如果身份验证协议不支持相互身份验证，不会有 SPN 被输入到字典。No SPN is entered into the dictionary if the authentication protocol does not support mutual authentication. 若要将 SPN 值添加到此字典中，使用的作为键。To add an SPN value to this dictionary, use the of the as the key. 在内部，该密钥将被截断以包含， ，和如果它不是默认端口。Internally, the key is truncated to include the , , and the if it is not the default port. > [!NOTE] > 访问的方法和属性需要不受限制。Accessing the methods and properties of the requires unrestricted . > [!NOTE] > 如果通过代理执行 Kerberos 身份验证，则该代理并将最终主机名需要要解析为 SPN。When Kerberos authentication is performed through a proxy, both the proxy and the ultimate host name need to be resolved to an SPN. 代理名称解析受超时。The proxy name resolution is protected by a timeout. Ultimate 主机名称解析为 SPN 要求进行 DNS 查找，并且没有与此操作的直接关联无超时。Resolution of the ultimate host name to a SPN requires a DNS lookup, and there is no timeout associated directly with this operation. 因此对超时同步操作需要较长时间。Therefore synchronous operations may take longer to timeout. 若要解决此问题，请向 SPN 缓存之前发出请求向其添加 ultimate 主机的 URI 前缀。To overcome this, add the ultimate host's URI prefix to the SPN cache prior to making requests to it. 当 未设置属性时，3.5 SP1 现在默认指定在 NTLM（NT LAN 管理器）身份验证交换中 的 SPN 的请求 URL 中使用的主机名。Version 3.5 SP1 now defaults to specifying the host name used in the request URL in the SPN in the NTLM (NT LAN Manager) authentication exchange when the property is not set. 在请求 URL 中使用的主机名可能不同于在客户端请求中的 中指定的主机标头。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the Host header specified in the in the client request. 在请求 URL 中使用的主机名可能不同于服务器的实际主机名、服务器的计算机名、计算机的 IP 地址或环回地址。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the actual host name of the server, the machine name of the server, the computer's IP address, or the loopback address. 在这些情况下，Windows 将无法通过身份验证请求。In these cases, Windows will fail the authentication request. 若要解决此问题，你可能需要通知使用的主机名的 Windows 客户端在请求 URL 中请求 ("contoso"，例如) 实际上是备用名称为本地计算机。To address the issue, you may need to notify Windows that the host name used in the request URL in the client request ("contoso", for example) is actually an alternate name for the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的内容。The following code example demonstrates displaying the contents of the . [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate (System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate(class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Shared Function PreAuthenticate (request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ PreAuthenticate(System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);

returns.span: 如果可以对请求进行预身份验证，则为 类的实例，否则为 。

span.span: An instance of the class if the request can be preauthenticated; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则此方法返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果身份验证模块可以进行请求时，预身份验证方法返回一个实例，身份验证和授权信息发送至服务器而等待要发出质询的资源不是提前。If the authentication module can preauthenticate the request, the method returns an Authentication instance and sends the authorization information to the server preemptively instead of waiting for the resource to issue a challenge. 此行为所述的 RFC 2617 3.3 节 (HTTP 身份验证： 基本和摘要式访问身份验证)。This behavior is outlined in section 3.3 of RFC 2617 (HTTP Authentication: Basic and Digest Access Authentication). 支持预身份验证的身份验证模块允许客户端通过避免额外的往返行程引起的身份验证质询提高服务器的效率。Authentication modules that support preauthentication allow clients to improve server efficiency by avoiding extra round trips caused by authentication challenges. 可以进行预身份验证的授权模块请求组属性`true`。Authorization modules that can preauthenticate requests set the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Register (System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authenticationModule);
.method public static hidebysig void Register(class System.Net.IAuthenticationModule authenticationModule) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Register (authenticationModule As IAuthenticationModule)
public: static void Register(System::Net::IAuthenticationModule ^ authenticationModule);

param.name: authenticationModule
param.span: 要注册到该身份验证管理器的 。

span.span: The to register with the authentication manager.

summary.span: 向身份验证管理器注册身份验证模块。

span.span: Registers an authentication module with the authentication manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将身份验证模块添加到由调用的模块的列表的末尾方法。The method adds authentication modules to the end of the list of modules called by the method. 添加到列表的顺序在称为身份验证模块。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. 如果具有相同的模块是已经注册，此方法中删除已注册的模块，并添加`authenticationModule`到列表末尾。If a module with the same is already registered, this method removes the registered module and adds `authenticationModule` to the end of the list. ## Examples 下面的示例向身份验证管理器注册身份验证模块。The following example registers an authentication module with the authentication manager. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#2)]

permission.span: 用于执行非托管的代码。

summary.span: 获取注册到身份验证管理器中的身份验证模块的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of authentication modules that are registered with the authentication manager.

value.span: ，它启用要被阅读的已注册的身份验证模块。

span.span: An that enables the registered authentication modules to be read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供启用的列表的实例注册要读取的身份验证模块。The property provides an instance that enables the list of registered authentication modules to be read. 方法将模块添加到列表中，与方法从它中删除模块。The method adds modules to the list, and the method removes modules from it. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来获取身份验证管理器注册的身份验证模块的列表。The following example uses the property to get a list of authentication modules that are registered with the authentication manager. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#8)]

summary.span: 将身份验证模块从已注册的模块列表中移除。

span.span: Removes authentication modules from the list of registered modules.

span.span: Removes the specified authentication module from the list of registered modules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从由调用的身份验证模块列表中删除指定的身份验证模块方法。The method removes the specified authentication module from the list of authentication modules called by the method. 该模块必须已添加到列表使用方法之前可以从列表中删除。The module must have been added to the list using the method before it can be removed from the list. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以从已注册的模块列表中删除指定的身份验证模块。The following example uses the method to remove the specified authentication module from the list of registered modules. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#2)]
